flavorText:
"We guarantee you that within a week, you will feel like a new man."
—Galaxos Klynesmith, biophagus
name: Biophagus

rulings.text: If Biophagus’s ability produces more than one mana, perhaps due to an effect such as that of Mana Reflection, each creature cast with that mana will enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter. If all of that mana is spent on the same creature, it will enter the battlefield with that many additional +1/+1 counters.

text: Genomic Enhancement — {T}: Add one mana of any color. If this mana is spent to cast a creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
